In my own district, I've heard from women veterans and VSOs about persistent issues with sexual harassment at VA facilities. Or barriers to access -- like having to travel for hours to get a mammogram.

The @nytimes recently reported that while the number of women using VA health services has tripled in the past two decades, "many female veterans say they are made to feel as if they do not belong." https://nyti.ms/2TA3deg¬†

Women are the fastest growing population in the veteran community, but VA medical facilities too often reflect an institution not built for them.
